meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of a particular ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant welcomed all customers, including nonethnics.
meanings.sent2: The art displayed in the gallery was nonethnics, appealing to people from all backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The nonethnics decorations at the party added a unique touch to the ambiance.
meanings.sent4: Her style was like a nonethnics rainbow, blending different colors seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonethnics unity was evident in the diverse group working together.

meanings.definition: A person who does not belong to a specific ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The school had a mix of students, including nonethnics from various backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her heritage but respected the nonethnics in her community.
meanings.sent3: The nonethnics at the event brought a fresh perspective to the discussions.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of faces, he stood out as a nonethnics, embracing his uniqueness.
meanings.sent5: The nonethnics in the neighborhood were welcomed with open arms by the residents.
